Monday.name: Wall Slides
Monday.description: Standing with back against wall, slowly slide down and up while maintaining proper knee alignment
Monday.parameters: 3 sets of 10 reps, daily; hold position for 5 seconds
Monday.progressionCriteria: When able to complete 3 sets with minimal discomfort, increase hold time to 8 seconds
Monday.rationale: Promotes quadriceps activation and proper patellar tracking while providing external support

Monday.name: Single-Leg Balance
Monday.description: Stand on right leg with slight knee bend, maintain balance
Monday.progressionCriteria: Progress to unstable surface once able to maintain 30 seconds without wavering
Monday.rationale: Enhances proprioception and neuromuscular control post-ACL surgery

Monday.name: Resistance Band Terminal Knee Extension
Monday.description: Secure band to fixed point, perform terminal knee extension from 30° to 0°
Monday.parameters: 3 sets of 15 reps, every other day
Monday.progressionCriteria: Increase band resistance when able to complete all sets with proper form
Monday.rationale: Targets quadriceps activation in functional range, crucial for ACL stability

Monday.name: Step-Ups
Monday.description: Step up onto 6-inch platform, focusing on controlled movement
Monday.parameters: 3 sets of 12 reps each leg, every other day
Monday.progressionCriteria: Increase step height when able to perform without pain or compensation
Monday.rationale: Builds functional strength and stability in weight-bearing position
